structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.text: When a dam has been deemed safe, removed, or constructed pursuant to an order of the commissioner; or a dam has been evaluated, constructed, repaired or altered to the satisfaction of the commissioner under a properly issued permit, the commissioner shall issue a certificate of compliance to the owner approving the dam but subject to such terms and conditions, if any, as the commissioner deems necessary for the protection of life and property. Such certificate shall be recorded by the owner in the registry of deeds in the county where the dam lies.
